title: How to Make Papad Curry (Poppadams Curry)

steps.title: Heat the oil in a heavy-bottomed pan on medium level and crackle the mustard and cumin seeds.
steps.content: Heat the oil in a heavy-bottomed pan on medium level and crackle the mustard and cumin seeds.

steps.title: Drop in the asafoetida and fry lightly.
steps.content: Drop in the asafoetida and fry lightly.

steps.title: Add the yogurt, turmeric, red chilli powder, and cumin powder.
steps.content: Add the yogurt, turmeric, red chilli powder, and cumin powder.

steps.title: Mix well and stir fry on medium level for about a minute or two.
steps.content: Mix well and stir fry on medium level for about a minute or two.

steps.title: Cover and cook on low heat till the poppadams change color.
steps.content: Cover and cook on low heat till the poppadams change color.

steps.title: Adjust the consistency of the curry as desired.
steps.content: Adjust the consistency of the curry as desired. If a drier consistency is desired remove the lid and let the water boil off.

steps.title: Garnish with chopped coriander and serve.
steps.content: Garnish with chopped coriander and serve.
